// Do not modify this file - YOUR CHANGES WILL BE ERASED!

using Lime;

namespace <%NAMESPACE%>
{
	public class <%CLASS_NAME%> : <%CLASS_NAME%><Frame>
	{
		public static readonly Frame FrameCache = new Frame(<%SCENE_PATH%>);

		public <%CLASS_NAME%>() : base(FrameCache.Clone<Widget>()) { }

		public <%CLASS_NAME%>(Widget widget) : base(widget) { }

		public new <%CLASS_NAME%> Clone()
		{
			return new <%CLASS_NAME%>(It.Clone<Widget>());
		}
	}

	public class <%CLASS_NAME%><T> : ParsedWidget where T : Widget
	{
		public T It => (T)Widget;
		<%COMMON_BASE%>

		<%INNER_CLASSES%>
		<%FIELDS%>

		public <%CLASS_NAME%>() : this(<%CLASS_NAME%>.FrameCache.Clone<Widget>()) { }

		public <%CLASS_NAME%>(Widget widget)
		{
			Widget = widget;
			<%INIT_FIELDS%>
		}

		public <%CLASS_NAME%><T> Clone()
		{
			return new <%CLASS_NAME%><T>(It.Clone<Widget>());
		}

		<%ANIMATIONS%>
	}
}
